channel.title: What ip do i use?
channel.description: OKay so i have No-IP.org as my domain... with my ip Im pretty sure i portfowarded right and im not sure i should put it as my ip 508 IP changers... i want my mates to join too but im not sure what to put in the box.. ive tried all ip's and no luck :S

item.title: What ip do i use?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If your hosting the server, the IP for your client will be 0.0.0.0 or localhost. Your friends will use your no-ip.

Read full topic
